hibernate-mapping.query: select new printchequedto( pc.AccountNo, pc.ChequeBookNo, pc.ChequeNo ) from PFMORM00014 as pc where pc.AccountNo = :accountNo and pc.ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo and pc.Active = true
select count(Id) from PFMORM00014 where AccountNo = :acctno and ChequeNo between :startNo and :endNo and SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo and Active = true

select new printchequedto( pc.AccountNo, pc.ChequeBookNo, pc.ChequeNo, pc.DATE_TIME, pc.SourceBranchCode ) from PFMORM00014 as pc where pc.AccountNo = :accountNo and pc.SourceBranchCode=:branch and pc.Active = true order by pc.DATE_TIME

select new printchequedto( pc.AccountNo, pc.ChequeBookNo, pc.ChequeNo, pc.DATE_TIME, pc.SourceBranchCode ) from PFMORM00014 as pc where convert(char(10),pc.DATE_TIME,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) and pc.SourceBranchCode=:branch and pc.Active = true order by pc.DATE_TIME
